section.65: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:The Prophet (ï·º) said, "When the Quraish disbelieved me (concerning my night journey), I stood up in Al- Hijr (the unroofed portion of the Ka`ba) and Allah displayed Bait-ul-Maqdis before me, and I started to inform them (Quraish) about its signs while looking at it
